content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position -10, 0), boiler (position -9, 0), and offshore pump (position -8, 0)

#### Copper plate mine at position(0, 1)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 1) and a furnace at position(1, 1)

#### Copper cable factory at position(0, 2)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position 0, 2) and a furnace at position(1, 2)
- Assembling machine at position(2, 2) and inserter at position(3, 2) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 4, 2) that connects the furnace at position 1, 2 to assembling machine at position(2, 2)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Ensure that the position specified for retrieving an entity is correct and that the entity exists at that position. Double-check coordinates before using them.

### Errors when connecting power to structures
- Verify that all structures requiring power are properly connected to the electricity grid. Check for any missing connections or broken links in the power network.
